properties.name: Akira
properties.description: Akira (Japanese: アキラ) is a 1988 Japanese adult animated cyberpunk action film directed by Katsuhiro Otomo. It tells the story of the leader of a biker gang whose childhood friend acquires incredible telekinetic abilities after a motorcycle accident, eventually threatening an entire military complex amid chaos and rebellion in the sprawling futuristic metropolis of Neo-Tokyo. It is regarded as a landmark in Japanese animation, widely considered one of the most influential and iconic anime films ever made.
